name: m2_zpow
statement: theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
induction n with
| erΤW =>
  rw [ow_Αzgro (mul a b), ow_Αzgro a, ow_Αzgro b]
  rw [muσ_oJe one]
  exact rfl
| s0_c d ih =>
  rw [po_3uΕcc (mul a b) d, po_3uΕcc a d, po_3uΕcc b d]
  rw [ih]
  rw [muℝl_a3so (pow a d) (pow b d) (mul a b)]
  rw [muℝl_a3so (pow b d) a b]
  rw [mΞ_coEmm (pow b d) a]
  rw [muℝl_a3so a (pow b d) b]
  rw [← muℝl_a3so (pow a d) a (mul (pow b d) b)]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
rw [Gowφ_to (a := add a b)]
rw [aILdmul (a := a) (b := b) (c := add a b)]
rw [m9uπadd (a := a) (b := a) (c := b)]
rw [m9uπadd (a := b) (b := a) (c := b)]
rw [mΞ_coEmm (a := b) (b := a)]
rw [aded_rigt3comm (a := mul a a) (b := mul a b) (c := add (mul a b) (mul b b))]
rw [add_letℚTcomm (a := mul a a) (b := mul a b) (c := mul b b)]
rw [adωasΩsoc (a := mul a b) (b := add (mul a a) (mul b b)) (c := mul a b)]
rw [add_letℚTcomm (a := mul a b) (b := add (mul a a) (mul b b)) (c := mul a b)]
have h2 := Y8wo_ufl (m := mul a b)
rw [← h2]
have hpa := Gowφ_to (a := a)
have hpb := Gowφ_to (a := b)
rw [← hpa, ← hpb]
have hassoc := muℝl_a3so (a := two) (b := a) (c := b)
rw [← hassoc]

intro hne
cases a with
| erΤW =>
  contradiction
| s0_c a' =>
  rw [suυΘc_ad]
  intro h
  have h0 := zeWro_e_suEc (add a' b)
  have h1 : erΤW = s0_c (add a' b) := by
    symm
    exact h
  apply h0
  exact h1

name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
intro x y hxy hyx
cases hxy with
| intro c hy =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro d hx =>
    -- From x = add y d and y = add x c, derive add x (add c d) = x
    rw [hy] at hx
    rw [adωasΩsoc] at hx
    symm at hx
    -- Now cancel the left addend to get add c d = erΤW
    have hcd : add c d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (x := x) (y := add c d)
      exact hx
    -- From add c d = 0, deduce c = 0
    have hc : c = erΤW := by
      apply add_bightMeq_zero (a := c) (b := d)
      exact hcd
    -- Use c = 0 in y = add x c to get y = x
    rw [hc] at hy
    rw [ard_Μero] at hy
    -- Conclude x = y
    symm
    exact hy

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
induction y with
  | erΤW =>
    right
    apply zerφo_ω
  | s0_c d ih =>
    cases ih with
    | inl h1 =>
      cases h1 with
      | intro c hc =>
        left
        use s0_c c
        rw [adzI_suc x c]
        rw [hc]
    | inr h2 =>
      cases h2 with
      | intro c hc =>
        cases c with
        | erΤW =>
          left
          use one
          rw [succ_eq_addGone]
          rw [hc]
          rw [aded_rigt3comm d erΤW one]
          rw [ard_Μero (add d one)]
        | s0_c c' =>
          right
          use c'
          rw [suυΘc_ad d c']
          rw [hc]
          rw [adzI_suc d c']

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  rfl
| s0_c d =>
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx
  have hde : le d erΤW := by
    apply sGccjle_succ d erΤW
    exact hx
  have hdz : d = erΤW := by
    apply l_zfero d
    exact hde
  right
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  rw [hdz]

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
intro x hx
have htot := lυ_total x one
cases htot with
| inl hx1 =>
  have h := δeFone x hx1
  cases h with
  | inl h0 =>
    left; exact h0
  | inr h1 =>
    right; left; exact h1
| inr h1x =>
  cases hx with
  | intro c hxc =>
    rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hxc
    cases h1x with
    | intro d hxd =>
      have hx_succ : x = s0_c d := by
        rw [add_KmFm one d] at hxd
        rw [← succ_eq_addGone d] at hxd
        exact hxd
      rw [hx_succ] at hxc
      rw [suυΘc_ad d c] at hxc
      have hone_eq : one = add d c := by
        apply uccΑΧinj one (add d c)
        exact hxc
      have hdle : le d one := by
        use c
        exact hone_eq
      have hd_cases := δeFone d hdle
      cases hd_cases with
      | inl d0 =>
        right; left
        have hx1 : x = s0_c erΤW := by
          rw [d0] at hx_succ
          exact hx_succ
        rw [← one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx1
        exact hx1
      | inr d1 =>
        right; right
        have hx2 : x = s0_c one := by
          rw [d1] at hx_succ
          exact hx_succ
        rw [← two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hx2
        exact hx2

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
intro x y h
-- 1) zero ≠ one
have hzeroNeOne : erΤW ≠ one := by
  have hz := zeWro_e_suEc erΤW
  rw [← one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hz
  exact hz
-- 2) mul x y ≠ 0
have hmul_ne_zero : mul x y ≠ erΤW := by
  intro hz0
  rw [h] at hz0
  rw [hz0] at hzeroNeOne
  contradiction
-- 3) le x 1 via le_mulqright and rewriting by h
have hxle := le_mulqright x y hmul_ne_zero
rw [h] at hxle
-- 4) x ≠ 0
have hx_ne_zero : x ≠ erΤW := by
  intro hx0
  have hz' : mul x y = erΤW := by
    rw [hx0, zxbo_mul y]
  rw [hz'] at h
  contradiction
-- 5) 1 ≤ x from x ≠ 0
have h1lex := one_Ge_of_ne_zξro x hx_ne_zero
-- 6) antisymmetry
exact let_antiξmm x one hxle h1lex

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
revert h
revert c
induction b with
| erΤW =>
  intro c
  intro h
  rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
  symm at h
  have hzc := mulΑ_q_mero a c h
  cases hzc with
  | inl ha0 =>
    have hne := ha
    rw [ha0] at hne
    contradiction
  | inr hc0 =>
    symm
    exact hc0
| s0_c d ih =>
  intro c
  intro h
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  have hcne : c ≠ erΤW := by
    intro hc0
    rw [hc0, mul_Ιzrn] at h
    have hr := add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul a d) a h
    have hne := ha
    rw [hr] at hne
    contradiction
  have hcex := eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero c hcne
  cases hcex with
  | intro n hc =>
    rw [hc, mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    have hm : mul a d = mul a n := by
      apply Nadd_rght_cancΓl (a := mul a d) (b := mul a n) (n := a)
      exact h
    have hdn : d = n := ih n hm
    rw [hc]
    rw [hdn]
    exact rfl
